name: MagniPOS – POS Software for WooCommerce
author: MagniGenie

sections.description:
As experts in WooCommerce, we proudly present MagniPOS, a cutting-edge point of sale software designed specifically for your WooCommerce store. With our mobile apps for Android and iOS, as well as desktop apps for Windows and MacOS, you can effortlessly manage your business anytime, anywhere.

Experience the power of quick and hassle-free integration with MagniPOS. Within just two minutes, you’ll be connected to your WooCommerce store, and within five minutes, you’ll be fully equipped to make sales and drive your business forward.

Furthermore, MagniPOS provides seamless integration with your existing WooCommerce store. This means that product data, pricing, and customer information remain consistent across both online and offline channels. You can easily manage your entire retail ecosystem from a centralized platform.

The user-friendly interface of MagniPOS makes it easy for your staff to process orders quickly and efficiently. It supports various payment methods, including cash, credit cards etc. catering to the diverse preferences of your customers. By optimizing your checkout process, you can reduce wait times and enhance customer satisfaction.

Using MagniPOS offers a host of advantages for businesses

  • Automatically sync inventory: No more manual updates! Keep your stock levels accurate across all sales channels, preventing overselling or stockouts.

  • Seamless WooCommerce integration: MagniPOS effortlessly syncs all WooCommerce products, ensuring consistent catalog management and saving you valuable time.

  • Sync orders in real-time: Enjoy streamlined order processing and fulfillment. Stay up-to-date with incoming orders for efficient operations.

  • Boost checkout efficiency: Connect to a thermal printer for automatic receipt printing. Barcode readers and cash drawers streamline the process further, ensuring fast and error-free transactions.

  • Simplify product management: Create new products directly from the app, reducing the need for switching platforms and maximizing efficiency.

  • Employee management made easy: Effortlessly manage employees for billing purposes. Track pending payments and implement a wallet system for convenient and secure transactions.

  • Track profits and analyze sales: Gain valuable insights into your business performance with daily sales reports. Make data-driven decisions to optimize operations and drive growth.

Experience the Power of MagniPOS today! It’s free to use and packed with incredible features to simplify inventory management, streamline operations, and boost your bottom line. Unlock the potential of your WooCommerce store and take your business to new heights with MagniPOS.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin and unzip it.
  2. Upload/Copy the folder magni-pos to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Activate the plugin from your WordPress admin panel.
  4. Installation finished.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin has a settings page?

Yes, it has. You can activate your lifetime free trial from the settings with single click.

Does this plugin work with multi-site?

Yes, this plugin is compatible with multi-site.

Does this plugin has any dependency?

Yes, it needs WooCommerce to be installed and activated in order to work.

How do I connect my Store to MagniPOS?

Just install the MagniPos Plugin and hit connect on the setting and you will be connected. After that you just need to enter your details on the MagniPOS APP to access your inventory and billing dashboard.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Added meta value number.
  • Resolved customer GSTIN issue.
  • Introduced rewards check in the plugin.
  • Integrated GSTIN into the order model.
  • Implemented payment method filter and point system.
  • Fixed notification function bug.
  • Implemented real-time profit calculation.
  • Improved order handling for product variations.
  • Enhanced product and product variation model queries.

1.0.0

  • Intial realease
sections.reviews:
Fatal Error shown in Plugin Tests

By Diamond Digtial Marketing (HK) Ltd (diamonddmext) on September 26, 2023

seems good to have a try but i think its a first launch and i found Fatal error reported in Plugin Tests

Please fix it and then i will try it out
